document.full_text: you can watch the weather forecast and business news daily on state-run libyan television, but you won't find any spot news on the war between forces loyal to muammar gaddafi and rebels seeking his overthrow.
document.title: libyan state tv glosses over anti-gaddafi revolt
lines_and_colors: you can watch the weather forecast and business news daily on state-run libyan television, but you won't find any spot news on the war between forces loyal to muammar gaddafi and rebels seeking his overthrow.
